name: Discovery (itch) (Oldcustard)
description:
A small platformer game for the KIT109 Exam Project.

How to play

Use the controls at the bottom of the screen to move the player. Discover what each does by trying them out! Finish each level by getting the player to his rocket-bike.

Features Spoilers Ahead ("Discovery" is the name of the game)
  • Player Movement
  • Player Reset (fall or death)
  • Level Switching
  • Animated Player
  • Sound Effects
  • Music
  • Title Screen
  • Restart Button
  • Level Title and "Description"
  • Level Timing
  • Wall Obstacles
  • Bounce Platforms
  • Invisible Level
  • Low Gravity Level
  • Scrolling Level
  • Chasing Enemy Level
